summary: Adds a new craftable sword with a unique model that is engulfed in blue light similar to the style of Hopesfire's enchanted from Morrowind.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a new craftable sword with a unique model that is engulfed in blue light similar to the style of Hopesfire's enchanted from Morrowind.

I originally set out to recreate Hopesfire but as I kept learning more I decided just to go for a semi-unique design instead. The sword itself is a heavily modified version of the normal Daedric sword model, made much longer with many changes to the blade, hilt and handle.

The sword comes with a strong visual effect attached to it that keeps it constantly immolated with blue-green light. This is part of the model and not an enchanted in itself - you are free to enchant the sword however you'd like.

The Immolated Ebony Blade can be crafted under the Ebony category of the crafting list for the same materials as an ebony sword plus 1 void salt. The stats of the sword itself are identical to that of a normal ebony sword and it can be tempered up to the same level.

Installation:

Just drop the textures and meshes into the folders as layed out in the zip file, turn the ESP on and you're good to go.

Known Bugs:

The only issue I'm aware of is that if you lay the sword on the ground the magical effect around the blade will halt after a few moments. It doesn't cause any issues but can look sort of strange to see the effect stop in mid-animation while it's laying around.
author: Senlur
